Buffalo Chicken Tater Tot Casserole


Ingredients
cooking spray
1 (10.5 ounce) can cream of chicken soup
3/4 cup ranch dressing
2/3 cup sour cream
1/2 cup buffalo-style hot sauce (such as Frankâ€™s RedHot
1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
1/4 teaspoon black pepper
5 cups shredded rotisserie chicken
1 1/2 cups sharp Cheddar cheese, shredded
6 cups potato tots
scallions, for garnish

Cooking Instructions

Gather all ingredients. Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220
degrees C). Lightly coat a 9x13 inch baking dish with
cooking spray. Whisk together cream of chicken soup, ranch
dressing, sour cream, hot sauce, garlic powder, and black
pepper in a large bowl until fully combined. Fold in chicken
and 3/4 cup Cheddar until fully coated in ranch mixture.
Transfer to the prepared baking dish. Top evenly with potato
tots. Transfer to prepared baking dish. Top evenly with
potato tots. Bake in the preheated oven until potato tots
are golden brown and cooked through and filling is bubbling
around edges, about 25 minutes. Remove pan from oven, and
sprinkle remaining 3/4 cup Cheddar evenly over potato tots.
Return to the oven, and continue to bake at 425 degrees F
(220 degrees C) until Cheddar is melted, about 5 minutes.
Garnish with scallions.
Source 

https://www.allrecipes.com/buffalo-chicken-tater-tot-casserole-recipe-8672248

https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=Buffalo Chicken Tater Tot Casserole
